description: The “Battlezoo Bestiary: Elemental Storm” campaign is set to bring a substantial addition to the worlds of Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition and Pathfinder 2e with over 170 elemental monsters, new spells, and enhanced gameplay rules. This new bestiary adds innovative monster crafting and hunting rules, enriching the role-playing experience. The monsters featured in the...
title: Battlezoo Bestiary: Elemental Storm Introduces Over 170 Award-Winning Monsters Alongside New Spells and Rules for 5E and Pathfinder

description: Archon Studio has reopened access to its Dungeons & Lasers VI: Caves crowdfunding campaign by opening the Pledge Manager. This follows a successful initial run in March, where the campaign raised nearly $2.2 million through the support of over 6,100 backers. The Pledge Manager phase offers both previous backers and new supporters another chance to...
title: Dungeons & Lasers VI: Caves’ Pledge Manager Now Active

description: Horrible Guild has revealed that “Similo: Jurassic World” will be joining its Similo game series in the fourth quarter of 2024. This new entry integrates the Jurassic Park franchise into the established format of the Similo deduction games. In “Similo: Jurassic World,” players work together to identify a secret card from a set of twelve,...
title: Horrible Guild Announces “Similo: Jurassic World” Deck
